picked_headlines.summary: PortAgent automates vehicle dispatching in ports using LLMs, reducing reliance on specialists and data, and speeding up deployment.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights a practical application of LLMs in logistics and transportation, showcasing innovation in engineering and management. It demonstrates the impact of AI on operational efficiency and decision-making in real-world scenarios.

picked_headlines.summary: AWS's recent 15-hour outage stemmed from a DNS issue in DynamoDB, revealing insights into their incident response and resilience strategies.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article provides valuable insights into incident management and resilience strategies, crucial for stakeholders in technology management and engineering leadership. It offers lessons on handling large-scale disruptions effectively.

digest:
- *Enhancing Geo-localization for Crowdsourced Flood Imagery via LLM-Guided Attention* improves urban monitoring accuracy without retraining models. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.11811)
- *ProtoFlow* offers interpretable surgical workflow modeling, enhancing accuracy in limited data scenarios. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.14092)
- *A LoRA-Based Approach* fine-tunes LLMs for academic advising in low-resource settings, achieving high efficiency. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15610)
- *Training Multi-Image Vision Agents* enhances VLM tool use with end-to-end RL, reducing the need for supervised data. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.08980)
- *SASQ* introduces efficient activation quantization for LLMs, improving deployment without altering weights. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.14481)
- *Privacy-Enhancing Infant Cry Classification* uses federated transformers for high performance with low data upload. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.13880)
- *Towards Nepali-language LLMs* improves NLP for low-resource Nepali language with a custom BPE tokenizer. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.14585)
- *FreeKV* boosts KV cache retrieval for LLMs, achieving up to 13x speedup. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.13109)
- *Complex Mathematical Expression Recognition* introduces CMER-Bench and new datasets for improved performance. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.13731)
- *Generative AI for Video Translation* addresses latency in multilingual conferencing with a scalable architecture. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.13904)
